# Physics 6 {#part-physics6}

Welcome to Physics 6. This section covers general information about the course structure.

## Overview

First, please take a look at the [ReadME](http://sophphx.caltech.edu/Physics_6/ReadMe.pdf){target="_blank"} and [Requirements](http://sophphx.caltech.edu/Physics_6/Requirements.pdf){target="_blank"} for this class.

Also, during the 1st week you will be asked to send the [Lab Scheduling Form](http://sophphx.caltech.edu/Physics_6/PHYSICS_LAB_SCHEDULING_FORM.pdf){target="_blank"}  to Frank Rice at 
rice@caltech.edu

For the **data analysis** for your reports you might need to take a look at [Physical Data Analysis Reference.](http://sophphx.caltech.edu/Physics_6/Elementary_Physical_Data_Analysis.pdf){target="_blank"}
